name: Just Ordinary PONG
description:
Relatively bare outside of pure gameplay, sorry about that and it will be changed somewhat soon. This game was made as an introductory game to Louisiana Tech University's CSC 477 Game Design course over the course of just under a week.

Left/Right Paddle Controls:

A/O - up

D/L - down

LeftAlt/RightAlt - Hit/Smash the ball

Q/I - Slow time

E/P - Invert other players controls
